These are:- Manually issued tickets from pre-printed booklets, without use of Printers. Pre-printed tickets issued with the use of Dot-matrix Printer. (iii) Tickets issued with the use of thermal lazar Printers paper rolls: In addition to above three systems, it been decided to introduce new system of semi pre-printed tickets as; (iv) Customized tickets of size 3x5" wherein blank paper sheets pre-printed from backside are used: At present, system at S.No j) to (iii) are in practice at most of the Plazas depending upon the availability of computer hardware software Only in case of emergency and in case of new Plaza where computerslprinters are not available, tickets will be issued as per system at S.No(i) The: issuance of tickets with new system at S.No (iv) is to be taken up where the new software of CMC has been installed or is going to be installed shortly and eventually at all Plazas, tickets will be issued as per the system at S.Noliv). Ac: ordingly PDs concemed should arrange the printing of customized tickets, wherein blank paper sheets 0f size 3x5" , pre-printed from backside with the information about the plaza and rates etc  will be used. The tickets should be pre-numbered at back side so as to keep their inventory at different stages as was being done in case of manual tickets and Pre-printed tickets issued with the use of Dot-matrix Printer.
